Description:
Detects guest users being invited to tenant by non-approved inviters

Author: MikeDuddington, '@dudders1'
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Guest Users Invited To Tenant By Non Approved Inviters
Query: sourcetype='azure-auditlogs' eql select * from _source_ where ((category = 'usermanagement' and operationname = 'invite external user') and  not initiatedby like '%<approved guest inviter use or for multiple>%')
